SoundHound, Santa Clara US, ONSITE Data Engineers, Speech, Search and AI, Front-end Engineers and more: http://soundhound.com/careers

Data Engineer at SoundHound here. We're rapidly expanding our data team here due to the upcoming release of our Hound app and Houndify platform as well as hiring in other areas. You can email me if you want to know more about any of the roles or what its like working here: rob at soundhound dot com. It is a fun music oriented company to work at and there is a lot of buzz about the new Hound side of things. But don't take my word for it check us out on Glassdoor and a demo video the blew up on reddit:

http://www.glassdoor.com/Overview/Working-at-SoundHound-EI_I... http://www.reddit.com/r/videos/comments/38fdyl/this_is_insan...
